Jobs at the University of Birmingham

Work with us and make important things happen

Search our vacancies

With thriving campuses in Birmingham and Dubai we have a large selection of opportunities in a range of academic, professional, technical, manual and administrative roles available.

Search our vacancies

We are a member of the Russell Group with a well established international reputation for teaching and research excellence.   

It's part of our mission to nurture a culture that provides opportunities for all to flourish and succeed. Our staff are essential to our continued success. 

The promotion of equality, diversity and inclusion are central to the mission and vision of the University of Birmingham.  It's embedded in our six core pillars, our values, and ambition for the future which are set out in our Strategic Framework. 

Why work for us?

A beautiful working environment and a commitment to help our staff grow professionally are just the start of the benefits on offer when you work for the University of Birmingham.

More than a workplace

Birmingham

One of the things our staff say most about working for us in Birmingham is that they love campus life.  Often compared to a village, our grounds boast beautiful gardens, sports facilities, shops, and eateries for lunch, networking, and socialising into the evening. 

The Barber Institute, Winterbourne Gardens, and Bramall Music Building are among our campus attractions. We host a wide variety of cultural and sporting events for the city - making us one of the top destinations in Birmingham for academics and tourists alike.

Dubai 

Dubai is just as impressive - combining cutting edge technology with heritage, tradition, and the beauty of Arabic culture and architecture.

Our second campus is located in Dubai International Academic City (DIAC), the world’s largest free zone dedicated solely to education. 

Designed with collaboration in mind, this state of the art campus occupies a prominent position at the heart of academic city and boasts an incredible range of facilities for staff and students alike. 

Find out about working in Dubai.
